title.narrative: Multi-sectoral Nutrition, WaSH and Livelihood Support to the Vulnerable Population of Yobe State

description.narrative: The action aims to strengthen the technical capacity of Government institutions, including community structures for improved access to nutrition treatment and preventive services, safe water and sanitation including hygiene promotion and access to social protection support for most vulnerable households. The action aimed will focus on treating severely acutely malnourished children aged 6-59 months through health facilities and promoting optimal infant and young child feeding, health and hygienic practices among pregnant and lactating mothers.
